---
title: "Resampling"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
library(broom)
library(ISLR)

```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

train <- sample(392,196)
auto <- tibble(Auto)
```

### Linear regression 

```{r}
lm_fit <-  lm(mpg ~ horsepower ,data = auto, subset = train)
lm_fit2 <- lm(mpg ~ poly(horsepower, 2) ,data = auto, subset = train)
lm_fit3 <- lm(mpg ~ poly(horsepower, 3) ,data = auto, subset = train)

auto %>% 
  slice(-train) %>% 
  gather_predictions(lm_fit, lm_fit2, lm_fit3) %>% 
  group_by(model) %>% 
  summarise(mse = mean((mpg - pred)^2))
```

### Linear regression with polynominal predictors 
```{r}


auto %>% 
  slice(-train) %>% 
  add_predictions(lm_fit2) %>% 
  summarise(mse = mean((mpg - pred)^2))

```
